recipesJson.name: Grounded
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: An earthy tobacco with heavier floral notes, including vanilla. Some Jasmine, Lavender, and Vanilla with a hint of honey.

reviews.text: This is a great tobacco mix! Not like anything I’ve tried before. The tea, vanilla, and lavender are great accents to the tobaccos, and the sweetness from the honey is a nice touch. Good call on these flavors. It’s not something that would have occurred to me. This will be a regular in my rotation.
